thread.title: FA Cup odds: Man Utd and Chelsea suffer after nightmare quarter-final draw | Metro News
thread.title_full: FA Cup odds: Man Utd and Chelsea suffer after nightmare quarter-final draw | Metro News

author: Phil Haigh For Metro.Co.Uk
title: FA Cup odds: Man Utd and Chelsea suffer after nightmare quarter-final draw | Metro News
text:
Phil Haigh for Metro.co.uk Monday 20 Feb 2017 10:06 am Arsene Wenger must be thrilled with Arsenal’s draw (Photo by Laurence Griffiths/Getty Images) 
The FA Cup quarter-final draw has seriously shaken up the odds for the competition, with Arsenal’s dream draw making them favourites to lift the trophy. 
The Gunners are yet to play their fifth round tie, but are clear favourites to beat Sutton United on Monday. If they win that they will face another non-league side, Lincoln City, in the last eight. Theo Walcott left red-faced as Arsenal fans slam club for 'disrespectful' gesture 
Chelsea and Manchester United have not been treated so favourably by Lady Luck as they face each other in the quarter-finals and their odds have lengthened as a result. 
Spurs and Manchester City are currently joint second favourites to get their hands on the famous old silverware. Spurs eased into the quarter-finals with a 3-0 win at Fulham on Sunday (GLYN KIRK/AFP/Getty Images) 
What are the odds to win the FA Cup? (Courtesy of Paddy Power ) 
Arsenal – 10/3
